constraints.name: pairwise_increasing
constraints.description: 二元组 (p, q) 满足 p < q 且 a_p < a_q

constraints.name: interval_coverage
constraints.description: 存在两个区间 [l_u, r_u] 和 [l_v, r_v]，使得 l_u ≤ p ≤ r_u 且 l_v ≤ q ≤ r_v
constraints.formal: ∃ u, v, 1 ≤ u < v ≤ m_i, l_u ≤ p ≤ r_u ∧ l_v ≤ q ≤ r_v

constraints.name: disjoint_intervals
constraints.description: 区间 [l_j, r_j] 之间不重叠，即 r_j < l_{j+1}
